Leave empty to generate slug automatical: Leave empty to generate slug automatically name.
A short description of the post (will be: A short description of the post (will be used in meta tags).
Will be used in the URL of the post. Lea: Will be used in the URL of the post. Leave empty to generate slug automatically from title.
Author: Author
The code that will be used to redeem the: The code that will be used to redeem the discount.
The prefix will be added to the beginnin: The prefix will be added to the beginning of each code.
The number of codes to generate.
If you choose percentage, enter a number: If you choose percentage, enter a number between 0 and 100. For example: 90 for 90%. For fixed amount, enter the amount in cents. For example: 1000 for $10.00
Select the plans that this discount will: Select the plans that this discount will be applied to. If you leave empty, discount will be applied to all plans.
Select the one-time products that this d: Select the one-time products that this discount will be applied to. If you leave empty, discount will be applied to all one-time products.
Enter -1 for unlimited redemptions per u: Enter -1 for unlimited redemptions per user.
If enabled, this discount will keep bein: If enabled, this discount will keep being applied to the subscription forever (or until valid if you set maximum valid date).
This allows you define how many months t: This allows you define how many months the discount should apply. Only works with payment providers that support this feature. (like Stripe or Lemon Squeezy)
Amount of subscription billing periods t: Amount of subscription billing periods that this discount recurs for. Only works with payment providers that support this feature. (like Paddle)
Name: Name
Test Email Failed To Send with message:: Test Email Failed To Send with message:
Test Email Queued For Sending, check \/h: Test Email Queued For Sending, check /horizon to see if it was sent.
The selected payment provider is not Lem: The selected payment provider is not Lemon Squeezy.
The product with the variant ID :variant: The product with the variant ID :variantId was found and is matching your plan product details.
Enter price in lowest denomination for a: Enter price in lowest denomination for a currency (cents). E.g. 1000 = 10.00
Leave empty to generate slug automatical: Leave empty to generate slug automatically from product name.
One line description of the product.
The maximum quantity of this product tha: The maximum quantity of this product that can be purchased at once. If set to 1, customers will not be able to edit the quantity on the checkout page.
If the product is not active, your custo: If the product is not active, your customers will not be able to purchase it.
Add any additional data to this product. You can use this to store product features that could later be retrieved to serve your users.
Add features that this product offers. T: Add features that this product offers. These will be displayed on the checkout page.
A one-time purchase product is a non-rec: A one-time purchase product is a non-recurring product that is purchased once for a certain price.
The name of the payment provider (shown: The name of the payment provider (shown on checkout page).
Deactivating this payment provider will: Deactivating this payment provider will prevent it from being used for new & old subscriptions. Customers will not be able to pay for their services so USE WITH CAUTION.
This plan has subscriptions and cannot b: This plan has subscriptions and cannot be deleted.
Pick the price type for this plan.
Enter price in lowest denomination for a: Enter price in lowest denomination for a currency (cents). E.g. 1000 = $10.00
Important: Fixed fee is available only f: Important: Fixed fee is available only for Stripe.
A fixed fee is an amount that your custo: A fixed fee is an amount that your customer will be charged every billing cycle in addition to any usage-based amount. Enter fixed fee in lowest denomination for a currency (cents). E.g. 1000 = $10.00
It is highly recommended that you set up: It is highly recommended that you set up a fixed fee for your usage-based billing plans if you are dealing with low-trust customers, as customers can keep using your service and then disable their credit card to avoid being charged for usage.
Enter price per unit in lowest denominat: Enter price per unit in lowest denomination for a currency (cents). E.g. 1000 = $10.00
Enter tier prices in lowest denomination: Enter tier prices in lowest denomination for a currency (cents). E.g. 1000 = $10.00
At least one tier is required: At least one tier is required
The last tier must have \"‚àû\" as the v: The last tier must have "‚àû" as the value for "Up until (x) units"
The \"Up until (x) units\" values should: The "Up until (x) units" values should be in ascending order
The "Up until (x) units" values should be an integer or "‚àû"
Only one tier can have \"‚àû\" as the va: Only one tier can have "‚àû" as the value for "Up until (x) units"
Enter an example unit quantity to see ho: Enter an example unit quantity to see how the price is calculated.
Tiered (Volume) pricing model is calcula:
Tiered (Volume) pricing model is calculated as follows:
(volume of usage * price per unit) + Flat fee of that tier + Fixed fee (if any).
Tiered (Graduated) pricing model is calc:
Tiered (Graduated) pricing model is calculated as follows:
Sum of ((volume of usage * price per unit) + Flat fee) at each tier + Fixed fee (if any).
Leave empty to generate slug automatical: Leave empty to generate slug automatically from product name & interval.
Flat Rate: Fixed price per billing cycle: Flat Rate: Fixed price per billing cycle. Seat Based: Charge per seat/user for each billing cycle. Usage Based: Price per unit with optional tiers.
Usage-based pricing is not supported for: Usage-based pricing is not supported for Paddle.
The maximum number of users that can be: The maximum number of users that can be added to a tenant (team). Use that to limited the number of users that can use this plan for each tenant. Use "0" for unlimited.
The name of the meter. Please use singul: The name of the meter. Please use singular form, for example: "Token" instead of "Tokens".
The number of intervals (weeks, months,: The number of intervals (weeks, months, etc) between each billing cycle.
The interval (week, month, etc) between: The interval (week, month, etc) between each billing cycle.
Plans are the different tiers of your pr: Plans are the different tiers of your product that you offer to your customers.
For example: if you have Starter, Pro an: For example: if you have Starter, Pro and Premium products, you would create a monthly and yearly plans for each of those to offer them in different intervals.
This product has plans and cannot be del: This product has plans and cannot be deleted.
Mark this product as popular. This will: Mark this product as popular. This will be used to highlight this product in the pricing page.
A default product is a kind of a hidden: A default product is a kind of a hidden product that allows you to set the features (and metadata) for users that have no active plan. Add a default product if you want to offer a free tier to your users. You can only have 1 default product and it cannot have any plans.
Add features that this plan offers. Thes: Add features that this plan offers. These will be displayed on the pricing page and on the checkout page.
A product is bundle of features that you: A product is bundle of features that you offer to your customers.
If you want to provide a Starter, Pro an: If you want to provide a Starter, Pro and Premium offerings to your customers, create a product for each of them.
The name of the role. Tenancy roles shou: The name of the role. Tenancy roles should start with ":prefix", and only tenancy permissions can be assigned to tenancy roles.
The following permissions are not allowe: The following permissions are not allowed for tenancy roles -> :permissions
The following permissions are not allowed for admin roles -> :permissions
Choose the permissions for this role. Te: Choose the permissions for this role. Tenancy permissions can only be assigned to tenancy roles.
Manage the roles in your application. Ro: Manage the roles in your application. Roles that start with "tenancy:" are supposed to be used for multi-tenancy users to control user dashboard capabilities.
Important: Plan change will happen immed: Important: Plan change will happen immediately and depending on proration setting you set, user might be billed immediately full plan price or a proration is applied.
You need to select a different plan to c: You need to select a different plan to change to.
Subscription will be cancelled at the en: Subscription will be cancelled at the end of the billing period.
Adding a subscription to a user will cre: Adding a subscription to a user will create a "locally managed" subscription, which means the user will be able to use subscription features without being billed, and they can later convert to a "payment provider managed" subscription from their dashboard.
The date when the subscription will end.
Failed to create subscription. User alre: Failed to create subscription. User already has an active subscription and cannot have more than one.
User could not be added to tenant.
User has been added to tenant.
User could not be removed from tenant.
User has been removed from tenant.
Leave blank to keep the current password: Leave blank to keep the current password.
A verification link has been queued to b: A verification link has been queued to be sent to this user.
Test SMS Failed To Send with message:: Test SMS Failed To Send with message:
ARPU takes into account all users, inclu: ARPU takes into account all users, including those who churned or never subscribed.
Average User Subscription Conversion is: Average User Subscription Conversion is the % of users who subscribed to a plan to the total users.
Churn rate is the % of users who cancel: Churn rate is the % of users who cancel their subscription each month.
MRR takes into account only active subsc: MRR takes into account only active subscriptions (no trials).
Total Revenue is the total revenue gener: Total Revenue is the total revenue generated.
Enter the email address of the person yo: Enter the email address of the person you want to invite.
This email address has already been invi: This email address has already been invited.
This user is already in the team.
You have reached the maximum number of u: You have reached the maximum number of users allowed for your subscription.
Choose the role for this user.
Send invitations to your team members.
You do not have permission to cancel sub: You do not have permission to cancel subscriptions.
Your subscription is past due. Please up: Your subscription is past due. Please update your payment details.
Your address information is not complete: Your address information is not complete. It is recommended to complete your address information before generating an invoice. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You do not have permission to change pla: You do not have permission to change plans.
You do not have an active subscription.
You are already subscribed to this plan.
Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor,: Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.
Please tell us why you are canceling you: Please tell us why you are canceling your subscription.
Please tell us what we can do to improve: Please tell us what we can do to improve our product.
Your account is blocked, please contact: Your account is blocked, please contact support.
You do not have access to this account.
The discount code has been applied.
The discount code has been removed.
Edit the name of your workspace: Edit the name of your workspace
This will be used as the meta descriptio: This will be used as the meta description for your site (for pages that have no description).
This is the currency that will be used f: This is the currency that will be used for all payments.
If enabled, when a customer upgrades or: If enabled, when a customer upgrades or downgrades their subscription, the amount they have already paid will be prorated and credited towards their new plan.
This is the email provider that will be: This is the email provider that will be used for all emails.
This is the name that will be used as th: This is the name that will be used as the "From" name for all emails.
This is the email address that will be u: This is the email address that will be used as the "From" address for all emails.
This is the verification provider that w: This is the verification provider that will be used for all user phone SMS verifications.
If enabled, the cookie consent bar will: If enabled, the cookie consent bar will be shown to users.
Google analytics will only be inserted i: Google analytics will only be inserted if either "Cookie Consent Bar" is disabled or in case user has consented to cookies.
Paste in any other analytics or tracking: Paste in any other analytics or tracking scripts here. Those scripts will only be inserted if either "Cookie Consent Bar" is disabled or in case user has consented to cookies.
If enabled, customers will be able to st: If enabled, customers will be able to start subscription trials without entering payment details, and later they can enter payment details to continue their subscription.
If enabled, a reminder email will be sen: If enabled, a reminder email will be sent to the user when the trial is ending soon.
This email will remind the user that the: This email will remind the user that the trial is ending soon. Enter the number of days before the trial ends that the first reminder email will be sent.
If enabled, a second reminder email will: If enabled, a second reminder email will be sent to the user when the trial is ending soon.
Enter the number of days before the tria: Enter the number of days before the trial ends that the second reminder email will be sent.
If enabled, users will be required to ve: If enabled, users will be required to verify their phone number via SMS before starting a trial without payment (to prevent abuse).
If enabled, users will only be able to s: If enabled, users will only be able to start a limited number of trials (to prevent abuse).
Enter the maximum number of trials a use: Enter the maximum number of trials a user can start. If a user reaches this limit, they will not be able to start any more trials and they will be required to enter payment details to start subscription.
If enabled, customers will be able to se: If enabled, customers will be able to see their subscriptions on the dashboard.
If enabled, customers will be able to see their orders on the dashboard.
If enabled, customers will be able to see their transactions on the dashboard.
If enabled, the roadmap will be visible: If enabled, the roadmap will be visible to the public.
If enabled, recaptcha will be used on th: If enabled, recaptcha will be used on the registration & login forms. For more info on how to configure Recaptcha, see the documentation.
If enabled, users will be able to enable: If enabled, users will be able to enable two factor authentication on their account. If disabled, the 2FA field will not be shown on the login form even for users who have it enabled.
If enabled, invoices will be generated f: If enabled, invoices will be generated for each successful transaction. Customers will be able to see their invoices in their dashboard.
Check this box if you are using Lemon Sq: Check this box if you are using Lemon Squeezy in test mode.
If enabled, an open graph image will be: If enabled, an open graph image will be generated for each page that has a title. Make sure that you already set the chrome binary in the config file.
If enabled, the logo will be added to th: If enabled, the logo will be added to the open graph image.
Choose the style of the logo to use in t: Choose the style of the logo to use in the open graph image.
If enabled, a screenshot of the page wil: If enabled, a screenshot of the page will be added to the open graph image.
Select the template to use for the open: Select the template to use for the open graph image. Changing the template or any of the settings will regenerate all open graph images for your pages, so choose your settings wisely.
Enter a title to use to preview the open: Enter a title to use to preview the open graph image.
Enter an image URL to use to preview the: Enter an image URL to use to preview the open graph image. (either image or snapshot will be used, not both, snapshot takes precedence).
Enter a URL of a site to take a snapshot: Enter a URL of a site to take a snapshot of to preview the open graph image. (either image or snapshot will be used, not both, snapshot takes precedence). Make sure above "Add Page Screenshot" is enabled.
Cannot render image, make sure the chrom: Cannot render image, make sure the chrome binary is set correctly in the config file "open-graphy.php".
The Stripe publishable key is used to au: The Stripe publishable key is used to authenticate requests from the Stripe JavaScript library. Check out the Stripe documentation for more information.
The Stripe secret key is used to authent: The Stripe secret key is used to authenticate requests to the Stripe API. Check out the Stripe documentation for more information.
The Stripe webhook signing secret is use: The Stripe webhook signing secret is used to verify that incoming webhooks are from Stripe. Check out the Stripe documentation for more information.
If enabled, tenants users with an \"admi: If enabled, tenants users with an "admin" tenant role will be able to invite users to their tenant.

SaaSykit is built using the beautiful La: SaaSykit is built using the beautiful Laravel framework (using TALL) and offers an intuitive Filament admin panel that houses all the pre-built components like product, plans, discounts, payment providers, email providers, transactions, blog, user & role management, and much more.

To integrate Lemon Squeezy with your app: To integrate Lemon Squeezy with your application, you need to do the following steps:
On the left menu, click on \"Settings\": On the left menu, click on "Settings" > "API". Click on the "+" sign on the right to create a new API key. Give the API key a name and click "Create API Key". Copy the generated key into the form in the field called "API key".
On the same page, on the left menu, clic: On the same page, on the left menu, click on "Settings" > "Stores". Copy the store id ("#xxxxx") without the # into the "Store ID" field.
On the same page, on the left menu, click on "Settings" > "Webhooks". Click on "+" to create a new webhook and enter the URL below.
Generate a new webhook signing secret an: Generate a new webhook signing secret and copy it into the form in the field called "Signing Secret" and also into the "Signing secret" field in the Lemon Squeezy Webhook creation form.
to generate a secure webhook signing se: to generate a secure webhook signing secret.
Click on \"Save Webhook\" and copy the g: Click on "Save Webhook" and copy the generated webhook signing secret and enter it into the field in the form.
To integrate Paddle with your applicatio: To integrate Paddle with your application, you need to do the following steps:
Under \"Developer Tools\" > \"Authentica: Under "Developer Tools" > "Authentication" you will find your Vendor Id (also referred to as seller ID). Enter it into the field in the form.
Under "Developer Tools" > "Authentication" > "Client-side tokens", click on "Generate client-side token". Once created, enter it into the field in the form.
On the same page, click on \"Generate AP: On the same page, click on "Generate API Key", and enter a name and a description for the key. Copy the generated key and enter it into the field in the form.
Head to \"Developer Tools\" > \"Notifica: Head to "Developer Tools" > "Notifications" and click on "New Destination". Enter a description for the webhook, and select "Webhook" as "Notification Type", and enter the URL below.
From the list of events, select all the: From the list of events, select all the events under "Transaction", "Subscription" and "Adjustment". So all the following events should be selected:
Click on \"Save Destination\" and copy t: Click on "Save Destination" and copy the generated webhook secret key and enter it into the field in the form.
In case you are installing this on a tes: In case you are installing this on a test environment, you can enable sandbox mode. This will use the Paddle sandbox environment instead of the live environment.
NEVER enable sandbox mode on a productio: NEVER enable sandbox mode on a production environment!
Head to \"Checkout\" > \"Checkout Settin: Head to "Checkout" > "Checkout Settings" and under "Default payment link", enter the following URL:
To integrate Stripe with your applicatio: To integrate Stripe with your application, you need to do the following steps:
Depending whether you want to use the te: Depending whether you want to use the test or live environment, you might need to tick the "Test mode" switch in the top right corner.
On the top menu, click on \"Developers\": On the top menu, click on "Developers" > "API keys". Copy the "Publishable key" and enter it into the field in the form.
On the same page, click \"Reveal live ke: On the same page, click "Reveal live key token" and copy the "Secret key" and enter it into the field in the form.
On the same page, click on \"Webhooks\": On the same page, click on "Webhooks" tab. Click on "Add endpoint" and enter the URL below.
Click on \"Select events\" then select a: Click on "Select events" then select all the following events:
Click on \"Add endpoint\" and copy the g: Click on "Add endpoint" and copy the generated webhook signing secret and enter it into the field in the form.
To integrate Twilio with your applicatio: To integrate Twilio with your application, you need to create a
, then get your Twilio credentials and e: , then get your Twilio credentials and enter them into the form here.
To enable 2-factor authentication, scan: To enable 2-factor authentication, scan the code above with your authenticator app.
If you can't use a QR code, you can ente: If you can't use a QR code, you can enter the code below.
In the next step, you will be asked to e: In the next step, you will be asked to enter a 2-factor authentication code.
Two-factor authentication is already ena: Two-factor authentication is already enabled for your account.
You can disable two-factor authenticatio: You can disable two-factor authentication by clicking the button below.
Two-factor authentication is an security: Two-factor authentication is an security feature that helps protect your account.
You can enable two-factor authentication: You can enable two-factor authentication by clicking the button below.
Below are your recovery codes. Please st: Below are your recovery codes. Please store them in a safe place as you can use them to recover access to your account if you lose your two-factor authentication device.

A Laravel-based boilerplate with everyth: A Laravel-based boilerplate with everything you need to build an awesome SaaS.
Join the best SaaS developers who are us: Join the best SaaS developers who are using SaaSykit to build their SaaS.
Easily offer your customers subscription: Easily offer your customers subscription-based & one-time purchase products with SaaSykit. All the webhook handling, subscription management, and billing are already set up for you in a beautiful and easy-to-use admin panel.
Collect payments with Stripe and Paddle,: Collect payments with Stripe and Paddle, and manage your customers with ease.
Customize the primary & secondary colors: Customize the primary & secondary colors of your website, error pages, email templates, fonts, social sharing cards, favicons, and more.
Based on the popular TailwindCSS, you ca: Based on the popular TailwindCSS, you can easily customize the look and feel of your SaaS application.
Create and manage your products, plans,: Create and manage your products, plans, and pricing, set features for each plan, mark a plan as featured, and more.
Rewards your customers with discounts an: Rewards your customers with discounts and manage all that from a beautiful admin panel.
In a few clicks, your customers can subs: In a few clicks, your customers can subscribe to your service using a beautiful checkout page that shows all the details of the plan they are subscribing to, allowing them to add a coupon code if they have one, and choose their payment method.
Display testimonials from your customers: Display testimonials from your customers on your website and build trust with your potential customers.
This component is magical in that it wil: This component is magical in that it will read the plans you defined in your admin panel, group them, calculate potential discount amount if user chooses a longer plan, and display all that in a beautiful way for your users.
A ready-to-use hero section component to: A ready-to-use hero section component to display your hero image, title, and call to action button.
An accordion component that you can use: An accordion component that you can use to display your FAQ in an intuitive way.
A focused component the brings attention: A focused component the brings attention to your call to action.
Tab slider component displays your conte: Tab slider component displays your content in a beautiful and organized way into separate tabs.
Easily customize your header and footer.
Beautiful buttons to use in your applica: Beautiful buttons to use in your application.
Pills to highlight your content where yo: Pills to highlight your content where you need to.
View your MRR (monthly recurring revenue: View your MRR (monthly recurring revenue), Churn rates, ARPU (average revenue per user), and other SaaS metrics right inside your admin panel.
Choose your preferred email service from: Choose your preferred email service from options like Mailgun, Postmark, and Amazon SES to communicate with your customers.
SaaSykit comes with a beautiful email te: SaaSykit comes with a beautiful email template out of the box that takes your brand colors into consideration, along with the typical emails for customer registration, verification, resetting password, etc set up for you.

You can use your favourite database (MyS: You can use your favourite database (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite) and your favourite queue driver (Redis, Amazon SQS, etc).
SaaSykit is updated regularly to keep up: SaaSykit is updated regularly to keep up with the latest Laravel and Filament versions, and to add new features and improvements.
Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guaran: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with SaaSykit, you can request a refund within 14 days of your purchase. Please write us an email at
You can host your SaaS application on an: You can host your SaaS application on any server that supports PHP, such as DigitalOcean, AWS, Hetzner, Linode, and more. You can also use a platform like Laravel Forge to manage your server and deploy your application.

SaaSykit is built on top of Laravel with: SaaSykit is built on top of Laravel with the intention to save you time and effort by not having to build everything needed for a modern SaaS from scratch, like payment provider integration, subscription management, user authentication, user & role management, having a beautiful admin panel, a user dashboard to manage their subscriptions/payments, and more.
You can choose to base your SaaS on vani: You can choose to base your SaaS on vanilla Laravel and build everything from scratch if you prefer and that is totally fine, but you will need a few months to build what SaaSykit offers out of the box, then on top of that, you will need to start to build your actual SaaS application.
SaaSykit is a great starting point for y: SaaSykit is a great starting point for your SaaS application, it is built with best coding practices, and it is developer-friendly. It is also built with the intention to be easily customizable and extendable. Any developer who is familiar with Laravel will feel right at home.
